caption.title: Correlations with the ratio of Autotrophic Respiration to GPP.
caption.p: The correlations with temperature in a baseline (1971–2000) ( a) and future (2056–2085) ( b) modeled period. The correlations with soil moisture in a baseline (1971–2000) ( c) and future (2056–2085) ( d) modeled period. All data are from the GLACE-CMIP5 CTL run.
